title: Testing files in subdirectories
body:
by **raul.san@sent.com**: 
If you have source and test files in subdirectories then `gotest` doesn't
searches the test files through subdirectories that you could have in the
Makefile. In the next example, it only finds `foo_test.go`.

===
GOFILES=\
        foo.go\
        foo_test.go\
        bar.go\
\
        abc/dog.go\
        abc/cat.go\
        abc/pet.go\
        abc/_test.go\
===
